entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
